label: ham
subject:
[R] rewrite a data file use write.table(),
	count.fields() show different pattern, any suggestion appreciated.
body: Then the pay is not derived by the several artists from their respective arts. But the truth is, that while the art of medicine gives health, and the art of the builder builds a house, another art attends them which is the art of pay. The various arts may be doing their own business and benefiting that over which they preside, but would the artist receive any benefit from his art unless he were paid as well?
